tool_description: This API allows you to to get data from a youtube video, such as video title, description, channel name, etc.
name: Youtube Video Description
title: Youtube Video Description

api_list.name: Get Video Details
api_list.description: This endpoint returns information on public youtube videos, such as video title, description, lenght, channel name and much more. Give it a try!

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Please provide the video Id only. i.e: G7KNmW9a75Y
